name: Fish out of water (Yrgo_Game_Creator)
description:
Mr.Mörteus used to be a humble fishbowl merchant. But as times changed, the interest for fish bowls was lost. 

Mörteus, naive as he was, decided to take a large loan from the fishy gang, Hells dolphins, to invest in his company. Sadly, the money did not help, so now not only was his company lost, but he was also in debt to Hell’s Dolphins. He had no choice but to skip town.
